body.p: Admissions Doctor is an academic consulting and test prep service geared towards providing complete service on all aspects of the admissions process. The LSAT Scoring Timer is one element of our portfolio of products designed to enable test-takers to measure and track their progress. The scoring algorithm for the timer was designed by an LSAT expert who has taught for over a decade and scored a perfect 180 on the exam.

p.strong:
